title: Remove caffeine.ai attribution from footer

requirements.text: Remove the 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link and text from the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer component no longer displays 'Built with caffeine.ai' text
The caffeine.ai link is removed from the footer
Footer layout adjusts appropriately without the attribution

nonGoals: Changing other parts of the application
Modifying the layout structure beyond removing the attribution
